about.title: About Me
about.desc: I am a computer engineering student at Balıkesir University. I am a passionate game developer and an open-minded software developer for new technologies. I develop 2D and 3D games for both mobile and desktop platforms using Unity game engine and C# programming language. I am also on my way to becoming a fullstack developer by using various modern technologies.

skill1.title: Game Development
skill1.desc: I have experience in developing 2D and 3D games with Unity. I am improving myself in game mechanics, level design, and optimization.

skill2.title: Full Stack Development
skill2.desc: I am knowledgeable in developing fullstack applications with React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

skill3.title: Creative Solutions
skill3.desc: I love producing creative and innovative solutions to complex problems. I aim to provide the best user experience in every project.

cap1.title: Unity Game Development
cap1.desc: I can develop 2D and 3D games for both mobile and desktop platforms with Unity game engine, and write multiplayer games using Photon and netcode structures.

cap2.title: Backend Development
cap2.desc: I can create RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js, model data in MongoDb, verify users with JWT, and set up middleware structures.

cap3.title: Frontend Development
cap3.desc: I develop fast, modern, and mobile-friendly interfaces with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. I care about UI/UX design and can develop fast, responsive, and performance-oriented frontend projects.
